about_the_game:
✦ Story ✦


I, Cheryl Mia Clark, was beautiful, smart, and witty. I looked like a wealthy lady who had my ways in the upper society, but, in reality, I was a fraudster who had slaughtered rich (people’s bank accounts) as if they were fattened sheep. In search of better opportunities and a bigger stage, I travelled all the way from England to America, the capital of freedom.

During my plan to approach a certain "prey", I encountered a shocking development that I never expected. The rich chairman of the board of directors, whom I had taken as the target of my fraud, was actually a real Soviet spy?!



After a series of misunderstandings, I was eventually forced to discover the secret, so I had to pretend to be a Soviet spy as well in order to save my life--Wait, I also had an innate superpower that could be used as a secret weapon. As long as a certain condition was met, I could read his memories and use them as leverage for my next move! And that condition was…to have sex?!

So I started a battle of wits in which lies, lust and death were all intertwined.

Would I survive?

And the me who survived…would she still be me?

"I'm a gifted fraudster, being a spy and stuff--I'll show you!"

✦ Gameplay Instruction ✦


The main storyline contains several choices, different choices will accumulate [Spy Value] and [Slut Value] accordingly.
During the process of accumulating the values, the character may die if the choice is not made carefully.
The final values will affect the final endings of the game.

✦ Game Features ✦


✧ 19 basic CGs, including more than 230 differentials
✧ Rich game text. Wordcount: ca. 90,000
✧ One main female character, two side female characters
✧ A drama with erotic excitement and humour
✧ Game ending: 4 types

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Violence, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse,  General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

✦ Story ✦


I, Cheryl Mia Clark, was beautiful, smart, and witty. I looked like a wealthy lady who had my ways in the upper society, but, in reality, I was a fraudster who had slaughtered rich (people’s bank accounts) as if they were fattened sheep. During my plan to approach a certain "prey", I encountered a shocking development that I never expected. The rich chairman of the board of directors, whom I had taken as the target of my fraud, was actually a real Soviet spy?!



After a series of misunderstandings, I was eventually forced to discover the secret, so I had to pretend to be a Soviet spy as well in order to save my life--Wait, I also had an innate superpower that could be used as a secret weapon. name: Master of Deception

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Cheryl Mia Clark, a super-powered fraudster who was a member of the elites. As Cheryl approached the target of one of her scams, she accidentally discovered a great secret, dragging her into a complicated situation! In order to escape from this weird situation, Cheryl’s solution was…to have sex?!
supported_languages: Traditional Chinese, English, German, Russian, Thai, Simplified Chinese
